# AWS Bedrock Agent Runner Dependencies
# Choose ONE of the following options:

# Option A: Synchronous (boto3) - simpler, for single calls per job
# boto3>=1.34.0
# botocore>=1.34.0

# Option B: Asynchronous (aioboto3) - RECOMMENDED for parallel execution

aiobotocore>=2.13.0
aiohttp>=3.9.0
